parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The type of the tag key. Valid values:

*   **Custom**: The tag key is created by users.
*   **System**: The tag key is created by the system.

>  By default, if the parameter is left empty, both custom tag keys and system tag keys are returned.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
The tag key.

>  This parameter is required.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the start page to return for a tag key that has multiple values. The valid value ranges from 1 to the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. This parameter is often used with the PageSize parameter. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of tag values to return each time for a tag key that has multiple values. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the DTS instance. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the instance ID.

>  If this parameter is left empty, the values of all tag keys of the current user are returned.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **ALIYUN::DTS::INSTANCE**.
